catalog_script_client.name: ValidationNewPasswordAtSubmit

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_ca111d12db12dc9067c89cb6db9619f4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Email account unlock & password reset">2d812903db865c5099b092d8db9619b9</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:40850c92db5a9c9067c89cb6db961919</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>ValidationNewPasswordAtSubmit</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    g_form.clearMessages();
    var type = g_form.getValue('u_key_choice');
    if (type && type == '1' && g_form.getValue("u_new_password").trim().length !=8) {
        g_form.addErrorMessage("The length of the password must be 8 character");
        return false;
    } else if (!type && g_form.getValue("u_new_password").trim().length !=8) {
        g_form.addErrorMessage("The length of the password must be 8 character");
        return false;
    } else {
        g_form.clearMessages();
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hunan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-31 09:11:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ca111d12db12dc9067c89cb6db9619f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValidationNewPasswordAtSubmit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coach Incident  optimization" source="x_achin_coach_inci">2b20d4e8db87f3404f229a64db96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coach Incident  optimization">2b20d4e8db87f3404f229a64db96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ca111d12db12dc9067c89cb6db9619f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hunan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-20 11:23:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
